entry.title: Run Boy Run
entry.summary:
Author: myswordhandissinging

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,309Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 804

Summary: Stiles Stilinski knew he should have stayed in to finish his assignment that was due on Monday. Instead, he had to go investigate with the pack. He knew he was going to regret it later, and he probably should have listened to his instincts. When he goes missing, the pack finds him in the same spot after days of searching. ¬† Or the one where Stiles goes missing for a couple of days and comes back blind and with magical powers. What did that bitch do to him? ¬† *This was first published in 2013 as a teenager. Now, as an adult with a developed frontal lobe, the age difference between Derek and Stiles is only 2 years, with Stiles as an 18-year-old high school senior and Derek being 20-years-old.

entry.title: burn my feet as they touch the ground
entry.summary:
Author: sparassiss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,384Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: Derek‚Äôs having a good day. He doesn‚Äôt trust it. It doesn‚Äôt feel real; doesn‚Äôt feel like it should be allowed. All he‚Äôs known for months, for years, is pain. The last ten months or so of near-daily stomachaches have made him edgy, unsure, suspicious. It‚Äôs not that he doesn‚Äôt want to believe it, but it feels like a trap. And Derek‚Äôs all too familiar with traps, all too familiar with pain and deception and betrayal. It‚Äôs just that it‚Äôs the middle of the afternoon on a Tuesday and he finished lunch a couple hours ago and his stomach is fine. But he doesn‚Äôt trust it.

entry.title: Threshold of the Void
entry.summary:
Author: Infernos

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,304Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 5

Summary: The Druid Council needs Stiles's help. Eight hundred years ago, druids made a catastrophic mistake, creating Tairseach Fol√∫s, a dimensional entity that feeds on supernatural life force. After devastating losses, seventeen druids sacrificed themselves to create a prison outside of our reality where the creature would be contained forever. Seventy-five years ago, a rogue druid discovered records of the prison and relocated it, anchoring it to the ley lines beneath San Francisco, where it began to degrade. The Councils formed a coalition with other supernaturals to reinforce the seals, but in this reality, those seals won't last. Now, a vengeful hunter family has allied with the druid's followers, and they intend to shatter the prison during the autumn equinox. Stiles has eighteen days to stop them and find a way to send Tairseach back where it came from, before it consumes every supernatural being on the West Coast

entry.title: Unchained Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: Black_angels75

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 109,492Chapters: 46/46Kudos: 10

Summary: Set after the events of Season 3, the story begins with Derek leaving Beacon Hills, determined to find himself away from the chaos that has surrounded his life. Stiles, on the other hand, is adjusting to a new sense of normalcy while quietly dealing with the lingering trauma from the Nogitsune.Months later, Derek unexpectedly returns to Beacon Hills after hearing rumors of a new supernatural threat. The reunion is anything but smooth-Stiles is both relieved and furious with Derek for leaving without an explanation.What will happend between them?How long had Stiles been upset? When will Derek explain himself?The story culminates in a climactic showdown with the new threat, where Derek and Stiles must trust each other completely to save the pack. Along the way, they finally admit their feelings, realizing that love can be as transformative and healing as it is terrifying.The story blends action, humor, and romance, with plenty of heartfelt moments, heated kisses, and the pack's reactions to their evolving relationship.plagiarism is a crime¬©All the rights reserv

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,433,820Chapters: 43/?Kudos: 64

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces‚Äîhuman and otherwise‚Äîare already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn‚Äôt. Protection becomes complicated. And the past‚Äîburied, sealed, and forgotten‚Äîrefuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

Author: Kira55

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,783Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 84

Summary: When Stiles signed up to be Scott‚Äôs puppy trainer, he didn't think that would include being taken by a geriatric grandpa, seeing his ‚Äòfriend‚Äô turn into a lizard, or, on a very embarrassing occasion, collapsing into 200 pounds of sourwolf. He should have checked for a 5-year life guarantee in the contract.Or‚Ä¶.What if the Hale fire had been stopped before it ever started?
